entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Laurentides (Réserve faunique)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:45 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -20.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: L'Étape 10:00 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa rising

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
